description: Biochemists use Bio-Rad gel imaging systems to record and analyze the results of gel electrophoresis tests. For example, a biochemist may use a Bio-Rad system to record and analyze the result of a western blot, which is a test that detects specific proteins in a tissue sample.

Bio-Rad Quantity One is an analysis program that biochemists use to import, analyze, and save digital copies of their gel electrophoresis results. The images Quantity One creates are saved as 1SC files.
